content: SPX-H Speed core bit (inch) Ultimate core bit with X-Change Module for faster, smoother coring in virtually all types of concrete – for ≥2.5 kW tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond core bits, X-Change modules, and segments- - - ### FEATURES:Features Highest coring speed – up to 50% faster than previous premium core bits, helping you get the job done earlier Smoother coring – up to 40% less pressure needed on the handle versus previous premium core bits, saving your energy when core drilling all day Versatility – drill in practically every concrete type, including concrete with a high rebar content, using the same core bits Hilti Equidist technology (1-3/8 diameter and above) – precisely positioned diamonds for unmatched drilling performance and constant drilling speeds over the entire life of the core bit Hilti BL quick-release connection end lets you fit or remove core bits very quickly – no tools required Applications BL quick-release connection end for high power Hilti diamond drilling tools (more than 2.5 kW), Hilti BL shank BS (1-¼) universal connection end for Hilti and competition diamond drilling tools Rig-based wet coring in virtually all types of concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with: DD 200, DD 250-CA, DD 350-CA Base materials: Concrete Drilling Mode: Rig-mounted Technical Data | For use with | DD 200, DD 250-CA, DD 350-CA | Base materials | Concrete | Drilling Mode | Rig-mounted | Wet or dry operation | Wet | Laser welded segments | Yes | Connection end | BS (1-1/4 in), BL (Hilti) | Working length | 16 in | Segment height | 10 mm ### ITEMS- 3872377 -
